title: Down & Leave-It Foundations
summary: Introduce impulse control and polite behaviour.

lessons.title: Down 1
lessons.objective: Puppy offers relaxed down on cue.
steps: Lure nose to floor then forward so elbows drop.
Mark and feed several treats on floor.
Add cue word after several reps.
supportGuidelines: If stuck: start from sit; lure slower.

lessons.title: Leave-It 1
lessons.objective: Teach puppy to back off from a tempting item.
steps: Show closed fist with treat inside; wait for puppy to back away.
Mark 'Yes' and give a different treat from other hand.
supportGuidelines: If nibbling hand: keep fist closed, stay still.

lessons.title: Cat Scent Intro (Optional)
lessons.objective: Begin calm curiosity toward household cats.
steps: Let puppy sniff cat scent cloth; reward calm sniffing.
supportGuidelines: Keep cats separate initially; pair scent with treats.
